**In Vietnam, is trading gold jewelry a conditional business line? What are
responsibilities of enterprises trading gold jewelry and fine arts?**

![Mục lục bài viết](https://cdn.thuvienphapluat.vn/images/mluc.png) Nội dung
chinh

  * In Vietnam, What are the conditions for enterprises trading gold jewelry?
  * What are responsibilities of enterprises trading gold jewelry and fine arts?

## In Vietnam, is trading gold jewelry a conditional business line?

Pursuant to Article 8 of the Decree 24/2012/NĐ-CP stipulating conditions for
enterprises trading gold jewelry and fine arts:

Enterprises trading gold jewellery and fine arts must meet the following
conditions:

1\. The enterprises is established under law provisions and the Certificate of
enterprise registration must include the production of gold jewelry and fine
arts.

2\. Having premises, facilities and equipments serving gold jewelry and fine
art trading.

In addition, as precribed in No.226, Appendix IV of the Law on Investment,
gold trading including gold jewelry trading is classified as a conditional
business line.

As regulations above, as gold trading including gold jewelry trading is a
conditional business line, you have to register and meet all requirements
before running in this business.

## What are responsibilities of enterprises trading gold jewelry and fine
arts?

Pursuant to Article 9 of the Decree 24/2012/NĐ-CP stipulating responsibilities
of enterprises trading gold jewelry and fine arts:

1\. Publicly posting the weight, gold content, purchasing and selling prices
of gold jewelry and fine art at the location of transaction, taking
responsibilities before law for the quality of their products being sold in
the market.

2\. Complying with law provisions on the accounting regime, invoices and
accounting receipts.

3\. Complying with law provisions on measurement.

4\. Taking measures and facilities and equipment to ensure safety in business
activities.

5\. Complying with this Decree and other relevant law provisions.

Best regards!
